themes.name: Dark Theme
themes.description: Dark color scheme for low-light environments

advancesQuestions.text: Has the organization developed and documented access control policies and procedures?
advancesQuestions.impact: Access control policies are fundamental to system security

findingTemplate.title: Missing access control policies and procedures
findingTemplate.description: Organization lacks documented access control policies and procedures
findingTemplate.recommendation: Develop and document comprehensive access control policies and procedures

advancesQuestions.text: Does the organization implement automated account management processes?
advancesQuestions.impact: Automated account management ensures consistent access control

findingTemplate.title: Lack of automated account management
findingTemplate.description: Account management processes are not automated

advancesQuestions.text: Are account creation, modification, and termination processes documented and followed?
advancesQuestions.impact: Proper account lifecycle management prevents unauthorized access

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate account lifecycle management
findingTemplate.description: Account management processes are not properly documented or followed
findingTemplate.recommendation: Document and implement account lifecycle management procedures

advancesQuestions.text: Is role-based access control (RBAC) implemented across all systems?
advancesQuestions.impact: RBAC ensures proper access enforcement

findingTemplate.title: Missing role-based access control
findingTemplate.description: Systems do not implement role-based access control

advancesQuestions.text: Are information flow controls implemented between system components?
advancesQuestions.impact: Information flow control prevents unauthorized data transfer

findingTemplate.title: Missing information flow controls
findingTemplate.description: System lacks proper information flow controls between components
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement information flow controls between system components

advancesQuestions.text: Is separation of duties enforced through assigned access authorizations?
advancesQuestions.impact: Separation of duties prevents abuse of privileges

findingTemplate.title: Lack of separation of duties
findingTemplate.description: System does not enforce separation of duties through access controls
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement separation of duties in access authorizations

advancesQuestions.text: Is the principle of least privilege enforced for all user types?
advancesQuestions.impact: Least privilege minimizes potential damage from accidents or malicious acts

findingTemplate.title: Insufficient least privilege implementation
findingTemplate.description: System does not properly enforce principle of least privilege

advancesQuestions.text: Are audit events defined and logged across all systems?
advancesQuestions.impact: Audit logging is essential for security monitoring

findingTemplate.title: Insufficient audit logging
findingTemplate.description: Systems do not have proper audit event logging configured
findingTemplate.recommendation: Define and implement comprehensive audit logging

advancesQuestions.text: Do audit records contain sufficient information for forensic analysis?
advancesQuestions.impact: Detailed audit records enable incident investigation

findingTemplate.title: Insufficient audit record content
findingTemplate.description: Audit records lack necessary detail for forensic analysis
findingTemplate.recommendation: Configure audit logging to capture all required information

advancesQuestions.text: Is there a process for regular audit log review and analysis?
advancesQuestions.impact: Regular log review helps detect security incidents

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate audit log review
findingTemplate.description: Organization lacks regular audit log review process
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement regular audit log review procedures

advancesQuestions.text: Are system clocks synchronized across all systems for accurate timestamps?
advancesQuestions.impact: Time synchronization ensures accurate event correlation

findingTemplate.title: Lack of time synchronization
findingTemplate.description: System clocks not properly synchronized
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement NTP or similar time synchronization

advancesQuestions.text: Are audit records protected from unauthorized access and modification?
advancesQuestions.impact: Protected audit records maintain integrity of security monitoring

findingTemplate.title: Unprotected audit records
findingTemplate.description: Audit records not adequately protected from tampering

advancesQuestions.text: Is there a documented baseline configuration for all systems?
advancesQuestions.impact: Baseline configurations ensure consistent security

findingTemplate.title: Missing baseline configurations
findingTemplate.description: Systems lack documented baseline configurations
findingTemplate.recommendation: Develop and maintain baseline configurations for all systems

advancesQuestions.text: Is there a change management process for system modifications?
advancesQuestions.impact: Change management prevents unauthorized changes

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate change management
findingTemplate.description: Organization lacks proper change management process

advancesQuestions.text: Are configuration settings monitored and controlled?
advancesQuestions.impact: Configuration control maintains security posture

findingTemplate.title: Insufficient configuration control
findingTemplate.description: Configuration settings not properly monitored or controlled

advancesQuestions.text: Is the principle of least functionality enforced through application whitelisting?
advancesQuestions.impact: Least functionality reduces attack surface

findingTemplate.title: Missing application whitelisting
findingTemplate.description: Systems do not enforce least functionality through whitelisting

advancesQuestions.text: Is multi-factor authentication required for all privileged accounts?
advancesQuestions.impact: MFA protects privileged access from compromise

findingTemplate.title: Missing MFA for privileged accounts
findingTemplate.description: Privileged accounts not protected by multi-factor authentication
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement MFA for all privileged account access

advancesQuestions.text: Are unique identifiers assigned to all system users?
advancesQuestions.impact: Unique identifiers ensure accountability

findingTemplate.title: Non-unique user identifiers
findingTemplate.description: System users not assigned unique identifiers

advancesQuestions.text: Are password complexity and lifetime restrictions enforced?
advancesQuestions.impact: Strong passwords reduce risk of compromise

findingTemplate.title: Weak password requirements
findingTemplate.description: Password policies do not enforce adequate complexity or rotation

advancesQuestions.text: Is there an incident handling capability in place?
advancesQuestions.impact: Incident handling ensures proper response to security events

findingTemplate.title: Missing incident handling capability
findingTemplate.description: Organization lacks proper incident handling procedures

advancesQuestions.text: Are security incidents tracked and documented?
advancesQuestions.impact: Incident tracking enables trend analysis and improvement

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate incident tracking
findingTemplate.description: Security incidents not properly tracked and documented

advancesQuestions.text: Is there a process for incident reporting?
advancesQuestions.impact: Incident reporting ensures timely response

findingTemplate.title: Missing incident reporting process
findingTemplate.description: Organization lacks formal incident reporting procedures

advancesQuestions.text: Are boundary protection mechanisms implemented?
advancesQuestions.impact: Boundary protection prevents unauthorized network access

findingTemplate.title: Insufficient boundary protection
findingTemplate.description: System boundaries lack proper protection mechanisms

advancesQuestions.text: Is transmission confidentiality and integrity protected?
advancesQuestions.impact: Protected transmission prevents data compromise

findingTemplate.title: Unprotected data transmission
findingTemplate.description: Data transmission lacks confidentiality and integrity protection

advancesQuestions.text: Are cryptographic keys properly managed throughout their lifecycle?
advancesQuestions.impact: Key management ensures cryptographic security

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate cryptographic key management
findingTemplate.description: Cryptographic keys not properly managed

advancesQuestions.text: Are FIPS-validated or NSA-approved cryptography used?
advancesQuestions.impact: Approved cryptography ensures adequate protection

findingTemplate.title: Non-approved cryptography
findingTemplate.description: System uses non-approved cryptographic algorithms

advancesQuestions.text: Are system flaws identified and corrected?
advancesQuestions.impact: Flaw remediation prevents exploitation

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate flaw remediation
findingTemplate.description: System flaws not properly identified and corrected

advancesQuestions.text: Is malicious code protection implemented and updated?
advancesQuestions.impact: Malware protection prevents system compromise

findingTemplate.title: Insufficient malware protection
findingTemplate.description: Systems lack adequate malicious code protection

advancesQuestions.text: Is system monitoring capability implemented?
advancesQuestions.impact: Monitoring detects potential security violations

findingTemplate.title: Insufficient system monitoring
findingTemplate.description: System lacks proper monitoring capability

advancesQuestions.text: Are security alerts and advisories monitored and acted upon?
advancesQuestions.impact: Security alerts enable timely response to threats

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate security alert monitoring
findingTemplate.description: Organization does not properly monitor or respond to security alerts
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement security alert monitoring and response procedures

answers.notes: Antivirus software outdated on 30% of systems
MFA not implemented on development systems
Encryption implemented for all sensitive data

generatedFindings.title: Missing or outdated antivirus protection
generatedFindings.description: Systems lack proper antivirus protection or updates are not maintained
generatedFindings.recommendation: Install and configure antivirus software on all systems with automatic updates

generatedFindings.title: Insufficient backup procedures
generatedFindings.description: Backup processes are not adequate or tested
generatedFindings.recommendation: Implement comprehensive backup strategy with regular testing

answers.notes: Audit logging not configured on all systems

generatedFindings.title: Inadequate audit logging
generatedFindings.description: Systems do not have proper audit event logging configured
generatedFindings.recommendation: Define and implement comprehensive audit logging

generatedFindings.title: Missing baseline configurations
generatedFindings.recommendation: Develop and maintain baseline configurations for all systems

authorizationPackages.executiveSummary: System implements moderate security controls with some gaps identified.

authorizationDecisions.boundary: System includes all components within the development network segment.

basicQuestions.text: Is antivirus software installed and updated on all systems?
basicQuestions.impact: Antivirus helps protect against malware and cyber threats

findingTemplate.title: Missing or outdated antivirus protection
findingTemplate.description: Systems lack proper antivirus protection or updates are not maintained
findingTemplate.recommendation: Install and configure antivirus software on all systems with automatic updates

basicQuestions.text: Are firewalls configured and maintained on all network boundaries?
basicQuestions.impact: Firewalls help prevent unauthorized network access

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate firewall protection
findingTemplate.description: Network boundaries lack proper firewall configuration
findingTemplate.recommendation: Deploy and configure firewalls at all network boundaries

basicQuestions.text: Is multi-factor authentication (MFA) enabled for all critical systems?
basicQuestions.impact: MFA significantly reduces the risk of unauthorized access

findingTemplate.title: Missing Multi-Factor Authentication
findingTemplate.description: Critical systems lack MFA protection
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement MFA for all critical system access

basicQuestions.text: Are password policies enforced across all systems?
basicQuestions.impact: Strong password policies are essential for access security

findingTemplate.title: Insufficient password policies
findingTemplate.description: Password policies do not meet security requirements
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement and enforce strong password policies

basicQuestions.text: Is security awareness training provided regularly?
basicQuestions.impact: Training helps prevent social engineering attacks

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate security awareness training
findingTemplate.description: Security awareness training is not regularly conducted
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement regular security awareness training program

basicQuestions.text: Are regular backups performed and tested?
basicQuestions.impact: Backups are critical for business continuity

findingTemplate.title: Insufficient backup procedures
findingTemplate.description: Backup processes are not adequate or tested
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement comprehensive backup strategy with regular testing

basicQuestions.text: Is sensitive data encrypted at rest and in transit?
basicQuestions.impact: Encryption protects data from unauthorized access

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate data encryption
findingTemplate.description: Sensitive data is not properly encrypted
findingTemplate.recommendation: Implement encryption for data at rest and in transit

basicQuestions.impact: Regular patching prevents exploitation of known vulnerabilities

findingTemplate.title: Inadequate patch management
findingTemplate.description: Systems are not patched regularly

assessmentDocuments.name: System Security Plan
assessmentDocuments.validationNotes: Annual review completed. Updates required for new controls.

reviewHistory.notes: Annual review completed. Updates required for new controls.
Annual review completed. No major changes required.

risks.name: Unauthorized Access to Sensitive Data
risks.description: There is a risk of unauthorized access to sensitive customer data due to weak access controls.

businessImpact.financial: High potential for fines and legal costs

treatment.plan: Implement stronger password policies and multi-factor authentication

risks.name: Outdated Software Vulnerabilities
risks.description: Critical systems are running outdated software with known security vulnerabilities.

treatment.plan: Implement a regular patching schedule and software upgrade policy

risks.name: Insufficient Backup Procedures
risks.description: Current backup procedures do not adequately protect against data loss in case of a disaster.

treatment.plan: Implement automated daily backups with regular testing

risks.name: Missing or outdated antivirus protection
risks.description: Systems lack proper antivirus protection or updates are not maintained

risks.name: Insufficient backup procedures
risks.description: Backup processes are not adequate or tested

risks.name: Inadequate audit logging
risks.description: Systems do not have proper audit event logging configured

incidents.title: Unauthorized Access Attempt
incidents.description: Multiple failed login attempts detected from suspicious IP addresses

actions.description: IDS detected multiple failed login attempts

incidents.title: Data Backup Failure
incidents.description: Scheduled backup job failed due to storage capacity issues

actions.description: Additional storage allocated and backup job rerun successfully

incidents.title: SSL Certificate Expiration
incidents.description: SSL certificate for main website approaching expiration

incidents.title: Network Performance Degradation
incidents.description: Users reporting slow network performance and intermittent connectivity issues

actions.description: Multiple user reports of slow network performance

securityObjectives.description: Establish a comprehensive zero trust security model across all systems

technical.title: Access Control Policy and Procedures
technical.description: The organization develops, documents, and disseminates an access control policy and procedures.

technical.title: Account Management
technical.description: The organization manages information system accounts, including establishing, activating, modifying, reviewing, disabling, and removing accounts.

technical.title: Access Enforcement
technical.description: The system enforces approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources.

operational.title: Security Awareness and Training Policy and Procedures
operational.description: The organization develops, documents, and disseminates security awareness and training policies and procedures.

operational.title: Security Awareness Training
operational.description: The organization provides basic security awareness training to information system users.

operational.title: Role-Based Security Training
operational.description: The organization provides role-based security training to personnel with assigned security roles and responsibilities.

management.title: Security Assessment and Authorization Policies and Procedures
management.description: The organization develops, documents, and disseminates security assessment and authorization policies and procedures.

management.title: Security Assessments
management.description: The organization develops a security assessment plan and conducts security assessments.

management.title: System Interconnections
management.description: The organization documents and controls system interconnections.
